class.name: ComputeShaderFile
class.description: Compiled compute shader with SPIR-V and reflection information for each shader kernel. In most cases, this can be used as a drop-in replacement for [RDShaderFile].

method.name: get_spirv
method.description: Returns the SPIR-V intermediate representation of the specified kernel (at [param kernel_index]).

method.name: get_version_list
method.description: Returns the list of compiled versions for this shader. This is always empty for Slang compute shaders.

method.name: set_bytecode
method.description: Sets the SPIR-V [param bytecode] that will be compiled for the specified kernel (at [param kernel_index]).

members.member: The base compilation error message, which indicates errors not related to a specific shader stage if non-empty. If empty, shader compilation is not necessarily successful (check each [ComputeShaderKernel]'s [RDShaderSPIRV] error message members).
The kernels declared in this shader file, one for each entry-point.

constants.constant: Matrices are stored using row-major order.
Matrices are stored using column-major order.
